00030 /* Creation flags. */
00031 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00032 #define T_SUSP    XNSUSP
00033 /* <!> High bits must not conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW|XNSHIELD|XNSUSP. */
00034 #define T_CPU(cpu) (1 << (24 + (cpu & 7))) /* Up to 8 cpus [0-7] */
00035 #define T_CPUMASK  0xff000000
00036 
00037 /* Status/mode flags. */
00038 #define T_BLOCKED  XNPEND
00039 #define T_DELAYED  XNDELAY
00040 #define T_READY    XNREADY
00041 #define T_DORMANT  XNDORMANT
00042 #define T_STARTED  XNSTARTED
00043 #define T_BOOST    XNBOOST
00044 #define T_LOCK     XNLOCK
00045 #define T_RRB      XNRRB
00046 #define T_NOSIG    XNASDI
00047 #define T_SHIELD   XNSHIELD
00048 #define T_WARNSW   XNTRAPSW
00049 #define T_RPIOFF   XNRPIOFF
00050 #define T_PRIMARY  0x00000200   /* Recycle internal bits status which */
00051 #define T_JOINABLE 0x00000400   /* won't be passed to the nucleus.  */
00052

00056 #define T_HOOK_DELETE XNHOOK_THREAD_DELETE
00057 #define T_DESC(cookie) thread2rtask(cookie)

00162 static inline RT_TASK *thread2rtask (xnthread_t *t)
00163 {
00164     return t ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(t)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL;
00165 }

00294 static inline int rt_task_spawn(RT_TASK *task,
00295                                 const char *name,
00296                                 int stksize,
00297                                 int prio,
00298                                 int mode,
00299                                 void (*entry)(void *cookie),
00300                                 void *cookie)
00301 {
00302     int err = rt_task_create(task,name,stksize,prio,mode);
00303 
00304     if (!err)
00305         err = rt_task_start(task,entry,cookie);
00306 
00307     return err;
00308 }
